publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5203 Malcolm Chisholm: Prevention of Child Abuse—That the Parliament recognises the World Day for Prevention of Child Abuse on Thursday, 19 November 2009; notes Article 19 of the UN Convention on the Rights of the Child that requires States Parties to take all appropriate legislative, administrative, educational and social measures to protect children from any form of abuse and neglect; supports CHILDREN 1st’s ongoing campaign for more abuse recovery services, and urges the Scottish Government to ensure that services are available in all areas for children who have been abused.

S3M-5203 Prevention of Child Abuse (lodged on 16 November 2009) Ken Macintosh*, Robin Harper*, Cathy Jamieson*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Liam McArthur*, Jackie Baillie*, James Kelly*, Mike Pringle*, Claire Baker*, John Park*, Patricia Ferguson*, Mary Mulligan*, Cathie Craigie*, Margaret Curran*, Marlyn Glen*, Elaine Smith*

S3M-5203 Prevention of Child Abuse (lodged on 16 November 2009) Hugh O’Donnell*, Bill Wilson*, Trish Godman*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Jim Hume*, Hugh Henry*, Helen Eadie*, Angela Constance*, Sandra White*
S3M-5203 Prevention of Child Abuse (lodged on 16 November 2009) Jack McConnell*, Gil Paterson*, Sarah Boyack*

S3M-5203 Malcolm Chisholm: Prevention of Child Abuse—That the Parliament recognises the World Day for Prevention of Child Abuse on Thursday, 19 November 2009; notes Article 19 of the UN Convention on the Rights of the Child that requires States Parties to take all appropriate legislative, administrative, educational and social measures to protect children from any form of abuse and neglect; supports CHILDREN 1st’s ongoing campaign for more abuse recovery services, and urges the Scottish Government to ensure that services are available in all areas for children who have been abused. Supported by: Ken Macintosh, Robin Harper, Cathy Jamieson, Mr Frank McAveety, Liam McArthur, Jackie Baillie, James Kelly, Mike Pringle, Claire Baker, John Park, Patricia Ferguson, Mary Mulligan, Cathie Craigie, Margaret Curran, Marlyn Glen, Elaine Smith, Hugh O’Donnell, Bill Wilson, Trish Godman, Dr Richard Simpson, Jim Hume, Hugh Henry, Helen Eadie, Angela Constance, Sandra White, Jack McConnell, Gil Paterson, Sarah Boyack, Lewis Macdonald*
S3M-5203 Prevention of Child Abuse (lodged on 16 November 2009) Robert Brown*, Karen Whitefield*
S3M-5203 Prevention of Child Abuse (lodged on 16 November 2009) Ross Finnie*
S3M-5203 Prevention of Child Abuse (lodged on 16 November 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
